courage.quote: Property is intended to serve life, and no matter how much we surround it with rights and respect, it has no personal being. It is part of the earth man walks on. It is not man
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 1. A true revolution of values will soon cause us to question the fairness and justice of many of our past and present policies
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 2. On the one hand, we are called to play the Good Samaritan on life’s roadside, but that will be only an initial act
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 3. One day we must come to see that the whole Jericho Road must be transformed so that men and women will not be constantly beaten and robbed as they make their journey on life’s highway
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 4. True compassion is more than flinging a coin to a beggar. It comes to see that an edifice which produces beggars needs restructuring
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: There are two types of laws: there are just laws and there are unjust laws… What is the difference between the two?…An unjust law is a man-made code that is out of harmony with the moral law
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: It is hardly a moral act to encourage others patiently to accept injustice which he himself does not endure
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Now everyone knows that the labor movement did not diminish the strength of the nation but enlarged it. By raising the living standards of millions, labor miraculously created a market for industry and lifted the whole nation to undreamed of levels of production. Those who attack labor forget these simple truths, but history remembers them
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Philanthropy is commendable, but it must not cause the philanthropist to overlook the circumstances of economic injustice which make philanthropy necessary
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: One who breaks an unjust law that conscience tells him is unjust, and who willingly accepts the penalty of imprisonment in order to arouse the conscience of the community over its injustice, is in reality expressing the highest respect for law
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: It may be true that the law cannot make a man love me, but it can keep him from lynching me, and I think that’s pretty important
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: It is a tragic mix-up when the United States spends $500,000 for every enemy soldier killed, and only $53 annually on the victims of poverty
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The time has come for an all-out world war against poverty. The rich nations must use their vast resources of wealth to develop the underdeveloped, school the unschooled, and feed the unfed. Ultimately a great nation is a compassionate nation
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr
What good does it do to sit at the counter when you cannot afford a hamburger?

courage.quote: Of all the forms of inequality, injustice in health care is the most shocking and inhumane
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: My obligation is to do the right thing. The rest is in God’s hands
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: In a real sense faith is total surrender to God
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: To be a Christian without prayer is no more possible than to be alive without breathing
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Science investigates; religion interprets. Science gives man knowledge, which is power; religion gives man wisdom, which is control. Science deals mainly with facts; religion deals mainly with values. The two are not rivals
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Evil can be cast out, not by man alone nor by a dictatorial God who invades our lives, but when we open the door and invite God through Christ to enter
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Our only hope today lies in our ability to recapture the revolutionary spirit and go out into a sometimes hostile world declaring eternal hostility to poverty, racism, and militarism
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: When our days become dreary with low hovering clouds of despair, and when our nights become darker than a thousand midnights, let us remember that there is a creative force in this universe, working to pull down the gigantic mountains of evil, a power that is able to make a way out of no way and transform dark yesterdays into bright tomorrows. Let us realize the arc of the moral universe is long but it bends toward justice
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: If we are to go forward, we must go back and rediscover those precious values – that all reality hinges on moral foundations and that all reality has spiritual control
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: If you lose hope, somehow you lose the vitality that keeps life moving, you lose that courage to be, that quality that helps you go on in spite of it all. And so today I still have a dream
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: When people get caught up with that which is right and they are willing to sacrifice for it, there is no stopping point short of victory
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: So I’m happy tonight. I’m not worried about anything. I’m not fearing any man. Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord!
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 1. At times, life is hard, as hard as crucible steel. It has its bleak and painful moments. Like the ever flowing water of a river, life has its moments of drought and its moments of flood
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 2. Like the ever-changing cycle of the seasons, life has the soothing warmth of the summers and the piercing chill of its winters
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 3. But through it all, God walks with us. Never forget that God is able to lift you from the fatigue of despair to the buoyancy of hope, and transform dark and desolate valleys into sunlit paths of inner peace
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: This is no time to engage in the luxury of cooling off or to take the tranquilizing drug of gradualism
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: My faith in man is, at bottom, a faith in God
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Everybody can be great… because anybody can serve. You don’t have to have a college degree to serve. You don’t have to make your subject and verb agree to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: In some not too distant tomorrow the radiant stars of love and brotherhood will shine over our great nation with all their scintillating beauty
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 1. This call for a worldwide fellowship that lifts neighborly concern beyond one’s tribe, race, class and nation is in reality a call for an all-embracing and unconditional love for all men
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 2. This often misunderstood and misinterpreted concept has now become an absolute necessity for the survival of man
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 3. When I speak of love, I am speaking of that force which all the great religions have seen as the supreme unifying principle of life
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 4. Love is the key that unlocks the door which leads to ultimate reality
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Power properly understood is nothing but the ability to achieve purpose… one of the great problems of history is that the concepts of love and power have usually been contrasted as opposites – polar opposites – so that love is identified with a resignation of power, and power with a denial of love
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: There is nothing more dangerous than to build a society with a large segment of people in that society who feel that they have no stake in it; who feel that that have nothing to lose. People who have stake in their society, protect that society, but when they don’t have it, they unconsciously want to destroy it
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Make a career of humanity… It will enrich your spirit as nothing else possibly can. It will give you that rare sense of nobility that can only spring from love and selflessly helping your fellow man… You will make a greater person of yourself, a greater nation of your country, and a finer world to live in
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Whenever you are engaged in work that serves humanity and is for the building of humanity, it has dignity and it has worth
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Hatred paralyzes life; love releases it. Hatred confuses life; love harmonizes it. Hatred darkens life; love illuminates it
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 1. I am convinced that love is the most durable power in the world. It is not an expression of impractical idealism, but of practical realism
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 2. Far from being the pious injunction of a Utopian dreamer, love is an absolute necessity for the survival of our civilization. To return hate for hate does nothing but intensify the existence of evil in the universe
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 3. Someone must have sense enough and religion enough to cut off the chain of hate and evil, and this can only be done through love
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Forgiveness does not mean ignoring what has been done or putting a false label on an evil act. It means, rather, that the evil act no longer remains as a barrier to the relationship. Forgiveness is a catalyst creating the atmosphere necessary for a fresh start and a new beginning.
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: A genuine revolution of values means in the final analysis that our loyalties must become ecumenical rather than sectional. Every nation must now develop an overriding loyalty to mankind as a whole in order to preserve the best in their individual societies
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 1. We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 2. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word in reality. This is why right, temporarily defeated, is stronger than evil triumphant
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Man must evolve for all human conflict a method which rejects revenge, aggression and retaliation. The foundation of such a method is love
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We have before us the glorious opportunity to inject a new dimension of love into the veins of our civilization
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Not everybody can be famous but everybody can be great, because greatness is determined by service
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The evils of capitalism are as real as the evils of militarism and evils of racism
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Now is the time to lift our national policy from the quicksand of racial injustice to the solid rock of human dignity
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The Negro needs the white man to free him from his fears. The white man needs the Negro to free him from his guilt
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: It is incontestable and deplorable that Negroes have committed crimes; but they are derivative crimes. They are born of the greater crimes of the white society
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The sweltering summer of the Negro’s legitimate discontent will not pass until there is an invigorating autumn of freedom and equality
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: I refuse to accept the idea that man is mere flotsam and jetsam in the river of life, unable to influence the unfolding events which surround him. I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Let us all hope that the dark clouds of racial prejudice will soon pass away, and that in some not too distant tomorrow the radiant stars of love and brotherhood will shine over our great nation with all their scintillating beauty
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Discrimination is a hellhound that gnaws at Negroes in every waking moment of their lives to remind them that the lie of their inferiority is accepted as truth in the society dominating them
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: To be a Negro in America is to hope against hope
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: I have a dream that one day on the red hills of Georgia, the sons of former slaves and the sons of former slave owners will be able to sit together at the table of brotherhood
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: In the struggle for human rights and justice, Negros will make a mistake if they become bitter and indulge in hate campaigns
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: I always had a deep affection for Malcolm and felt that he had a great ability to put his finger on the existence and the root of the problem. He was an eloquent spokesman for his point of view and no one can honestly doubt that Malcolm had a great concern for the problems we face as a race
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: In our glorious fight for civil rights, we must guard against being fooled by false slogans, as ‘right-to-work.’ It provides no ‘rights’ and no ‘works.’ Its purpose is to destroy labor unions and the freedom of collective bargaining… We demand this fraud be stopped
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We have deluded ourselves into believing the myth that capitalism grew and prospered out of the Protestant ethic of hard work and sacrifices. Capitalism was built on the exploitation of black slaves and continues to thrive on the exploitation of the poor, both black and white, both here and abroad
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The problem of racism, the problem of economic exploitation, and the problem of war are all tied together. These are the triple evils that are interrelated
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Commit yourself to the noble struggle for human rights. You will make a greater person of yourself, a greater nation of your country and a finer world to live in
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The good neighbor looks beyond the external accidents and discerns those inner qualities that make all men human and, therefore, brothers
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Only in the darkness can you see the stars
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: I feel that the people of ill will have used time much more effectively than have the people of good will
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Darkness cannot be overcome with more darkness, only with light. Violence cannot be overcome with more violence, only with peace
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: I mourn the loss of thousands of precious lives, but I will not rejoice in the death of one, not even an enemy. Returning hate, adding deeper darkness to a night that is already void of stars
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We may cry out desperately for time to pause in her passage, but time is deaf to every plea and rushes on. Over the bleached bones and jumbled residues of numerous civilizations are written the pathetic words: ‘Too late’
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Procrastination is still the thief of time. Life often leaves us standing bare, naked and dejected with a lost opportunity
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Have we not come to such an impasse in the modern world that we must love our enemies – or else? The chain reaction of evil – hate begetting hate, wars producing more wars – must be broken, or else we shall be plunged into the dark abyss of annihilation
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: There is little hope for us until we become tough-minded enough to break loose from the shackles of prejudice, half-truths, and downright ignorance. The shape of the world today does not permit us the luxury of soft mindedness
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: A nation or civilization that continues to produce soft-minded men purchases its own spiritual death on the installment plan
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: He who passively accepts evil is as much involved in it as he who helps to perpetrate it. He who accepts evil without protesting against it is really cooperating with it
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Never succumb to the temptation of bitterness
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Never forget that everything Hitler did in Germany was legal
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We stand in life at midnight; we are always at the threshold of a new dawn
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: A riot is the language of the unheard
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: War is a poor chisel to carve out tomorrow
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Stumbling and groping through the wilderness finally must be replaced by a planned, organized and orderly march
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The past is prophetic in that it asserts loudly that wars are poor chisels for carving out peaceful tomorrows
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: If you succumb to the temptation of using violence in the struggle, unborn generations will be the recipients of a long and desolate night of bitterness, and your chief legacy to the future will be an endless reign of meaningless chaos
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 1. Violence as a way of achieving racial justice is both impractical and immoral. It is impractical because it is a descending spiral ending in destruction for all. The old law of an eye for an eye leaves everybody blind. It is immoral because it seeks to humiliate the opponent rather than win his understanding; it seeks to annihilate rather than to convert
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 2. Violence is immoral because it thrives on hatred rather than love. It destroys community and makes brotherhood impossible. It leaves society in monologue rather than dialogue
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 3. Violence ends by defeating itself. It creates bitterness in the survivors and brutality in the destroyers
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Like an unchecked cancer, hate corrodes the personality and eats away its vital unity. Hate destroys a man’s sense of values and his objectivity. It causes him to describe the beautiful as ugly and the ugly as beautiful, and to confuse the true with the false and the false with the true
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The limitation of riots, moral questions aside, is that they cannot win and their participants know it. Hence, rioting is not revolutionary but reactionary because it invites defeat. It involves an emotional catharsis, but it must be followed by a sense of futility
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The more there are riots, the more repressive action will take place, and the more we face the danger of a right-wing takeover and eventually a fascist society
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: One of the greatest casualties of the war in Vietnam is the Great Society… shot down on the battlefield of Vietnam
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 1. The ultimate weakness of violence is that it is a descending spiral, begetting the very thing it seeks to destroy. Instead of diminishing evil, it multiplies it
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 2. Through violence you may murder the liar, but you cannot murder the lie, nor establish the truth. Through violence you murder the hater, but you do not murder hate. In fact, violence merely increases hate. Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: In spite of temporary victories, violence never brings permanent peace
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: At the center of non-violence stands the principle of love
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Peace is not merely a distant goal that we seek, but a means by which we arrive at that goal
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We must not allow our creative protest to degenerate into physical violence
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We still have a choice today: nonviolent coexistence or violent coannihilation. This may well be mankind’s last chance to choose between chaos and community
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We who in engage in nonviolent direct action are not the creators of tension. We merely bring to the surface the hidden tension that is already alive
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: There is something strangely inconsistent about a nation and a press that would praise you when you say, ‘Be nonviolent toward Jim Clark,’ but will curse and damn you when you say, ‘Be nonviolent toward little brown Vietnamese children.’ There is something wrong with that press
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We must concentrate not merely on the negative expulsion of war but the positive affirmation of peace
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Those who love peace must learn to organize as effectively as those who love war
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The choice is not between violence and nonviolence but between nonviolence and nonexistence
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 1. Here is the true meaning and value of compassion and nonviolence, when it helps us to see the enemy’s point of view, to hear his questions, to know his assessment of ourselves
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Part 2. For from his view we may indeed see the basic weaknesses of our own condition, and if we are mature, we may learn and grow and profit from the wisdom of the brothers who are called the opposition
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Gandhi was inevitable. If humanity is to progress, Gandhi is inescapable. He lived, thought and acted, inspired by the vision of humanity evolving toward a world of peace and harmony
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: I firmly believe that the Gandhian philosophy of nonviolent resistance is the only logical and moral approach to the solution of the race problem in the United States
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Nonviolence is a powerful and just weapon, which cuts without wounding and ennobles the man who wields it. It is a sword that heals
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Nonviolence is the answer to the crucial political and moral questions of our time; the need for mankind to overcome oppression and violence without resorting to oppression and violence
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Nonviolence means avoiding not only external physical violence but also internal violence of spirit. You not only refuse to shoot a man, but you refuse to hate him
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We adopt the means of nonviolence because our end is a community at peace with itself. We will try to persuade with our words, but if our words fail, we will try to persuade with our acts
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We must concentrate not merely on the negative expulsion of war but the positive affirmation of peace
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: It is not enough to say we must not wage war. It is necessary to love peace and sacrifice for it
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Peace is not simply the absence of conflict, but the existence of justice for all people
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: To ignore evil is to become an accomplice to it
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: It’s not the violence of the few that scares me, it’s the silence of the many
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The ultimate tragedy is not the oppression and cruelty by the bad people but the silence over that by the good people
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: History will have to record that the greatest tragedy of this period of social transition was not the strident clamor of the bad people, but the appalling silence of the good people
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: The silence of the good people is more dangerous than the brutaliy of the bad people
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: Never, never be afraid to do what’s right, especially if the well-being of a person or animal is at stake. Society’s punishments are small compared to the wounds we inflict on our soul when we look the other way
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We must learn that passively to accept an unjust system is to cooperate with that system, and thereby to become a participant in its evil
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We must speak with all the humility that is appropriate to our limited vision, but we must speak
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: There comes a time when silence is betrayal
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: We are challenged to rise above the narrow confines of our individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: I’m proud of you. I hope that you are proud of you too
courage.author: Fred Rogers

courage.quote: You’re tired and scared. Happens to everyone, okay? Just don’t let your feet stop
courage.author: Haruki Murakami

courage.quote: Soon, when all is well, you’re going to look back on this period of your life and be so glad that you never gave up
courage.author: Brittany Burgunder

courage.quote: Trying and struggling looks like incompetence right up until the moment it looks like success
courage.author: Shane Parrish

courage.quote: No matter what, just keep going
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind. C.S
courage.author: Lewis

courage.quote: But if a thing is humanly possible, consider it to be within your reach
courage.author: Marcus Aurelius

courage.quote: You can make a difference, and you can make it now. You can make a difference, in your own life, in your family, your community, your world
courage.author: Ralph Marston

courage.quote: Your own positive future begins in this moment. All you have is right now. Every goal is possible from here
courage.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

courage.quote: "You’re going to be happy", said life, "but first I’ll make you strong"
courage.author: Paulo Coelho

courage.quote: Relax. One bad chapter does not mean it’s the end of the book
courage.author: Paulo Coelho

courage.quote: Progress is almost never linear. Ups and downs and bursts
courage.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

courage.quote: Every day of our lives, we are on the verge of making those slight changes that would make all the difference
courage.author: Mignon McLaughlin

courage.quote: You’re not obligated to win. You’re obligated to keep trying to do the best you can every day
courage.author: Marian Wright Edelman

courage.quote: Perhaps I am stronger than I think
courage.author: Thomas Merton

courage.quote: Don’t worry about all of the steps. Begin
courage.author: Bob Goff

courage.quote: It’s okay to feel lost, to feel pain, to feel hopeless. What’s not okay is thinking life will be easy. Stay strong
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: I will keep preaching this to myself and others: there are no problems, only projects
courage.author: David Allen

courage.quote: It is totally unproductive to think the world has been unfair to you. Every tough stretch is an opportunity
courage.author: Charlie Munger

courage.quote: Throughout your life you will encounter tedious situations, and you must cultivate the ability to handle them with discipline
courage.author: Robert Greene (Mastery, Amazon book)

courage.quote: When you feel like giving up, remember why you held on for so long in the first place
courage.author: Paulo Coelho

courage.quote: There are days that life is about dreams, goals, brightness. And there are days that life is just about putting foot in front of the other and continue walking – there is nothing wrong about this
courage.author: Paulo Coelho

courage.quote: I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe
courage.author: 14th Dalai Lama

courage.quote: Often out of periods of losing come the greatest strivings toward a new winning streak
courage.author: Fred Rogers

courage.quote: The path through trouble is always made a step at a time, a breath at a time, a day at a time
courage.author: Jack Kornfield

courage.quote: Not seeing results? Feel like giving up? Consider this: the last thing to grow on a fruit tree… is the fruit. Doing amazing sh*t takes time. You want that fruit you gotta stay after it
courage.author: Tom Bilyeu

courage.quote: It’s not too late to recover. You’re young, you’re tough. You’re adaptable. You can patch up your wounds, lift your head, and move on
courage.author: Haruki Murakami (Kafka on the Shore, Amazon book)

courage.quote: Get a move on…Don’t worry whether anyone will give you credit for it…Be satisfied with even the smallest progress, and treat the outcome of it all as unimportant
courage.author: Marcus Aurelius

courage.quote: The only way that you’re ever going to get to the other side of this journey is by suffering. You have to suffer in order to grow. Some people get it, some people don’t
courage.author: David Goggins

courage.quote: If you haven’t started, then taking action is more important than finding the best strategy. If you’re already taking action, then ensuring you’re working on the right thing is more important than working harder. Your effort sets your floor. Your strategy sets your ceiling
courage.author: James Clear

courage.quote: Remember: everything hard will be painful, but just because there is pain doesn’t mean you have to suffer
courage.author: Justin Kan

courage.quote: One of the most important skills I’ve built is the ability to sit with discomfort. Being able to be uncomfortable (bored, on the receiving end of anger, in pain) and not needing to escape has changed my happiness and my life
courage.author: Justin Kan

courage.quote: The first step to overcoming failure is to fully admit you have failed. Admitting it will put your mind at ease and help you to see what you ought to do next
courage.author: Haemin Sunim

courage.quote: When we look at our lives as a whole, our current difficulty is like a cloud. Although large, it will soon pass
courage.author: Haemin Sunim

courage.quote: Pick your one overwhelming desire. It’s okay to suffer over that one
courage.author: Naval Ravikant

courage.quote: This too shall pass
courage.author: Unknown

courage.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going
courage.author: Winston Churchill

courage.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts
courage.author: Winston Churchill

courage.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are
courage.author: Theodore Roosevelt

courage.quote: You aspire to great things? Begin with little ones
courage.author: Augustine of Hippo

courage.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
courage.author: Confucius

courage.quote: There’s value in disaster. All our mistakes burned up. Thank god we can start again. Thomas A
courage.author: Edison

courage.quote: There are some defeats more triumphant than victories
courage.author: Michel de Montaigne

courage.quote: No matter how difficult the past, you can always begin again today
courage.author: Jack Kornfield

courage.quote: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better
courage.author: 14th Dalai Lama

courage.quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds
courage.author: Albert Einstein

courage.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it
courage.author: Henry Ford

courage.quote: Everybody has goals, aspirations or whatever, and everybody has been at a point in their life where nobody believed in them
courage.author: Eminem

courage.quote: Frame your mind to mirth and merriment which bars a thousand harms and lengthens life
courage.author: William Shakespeare

courage.quote: Not all storms come to disrupt your life, some come to clear your path
courage.author: Paulo Coelho

courage.quote: In the midst of winter, I found there was, within me, an invincible summer
courage.author: Albert Camus

courage.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success
courage.author: Dale Carnegie

courage.quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them
courage.author: Maya Angelou

courage.quote: It is impossible to live without failing at something unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all, in which case you have failed by default. J.K
courage.author: Rowling

courage.quote: Instruction does much, but encouragement everything
courage.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

courage.quote: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become
courage.author: Carl Jung

courage.quote: We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough
courage.author: Helen Keller

courage.quote: Courage, dear heart. C.S
courage.author: Lewis

courage.quote: One day at a time
courage.author: Haruki Murakami

courage.quote: Hope springs forever. J.K
courage.author: Rowling

courage.quote: Inhale courage. Exhale fear
courage.author: Mel Robbins

courage.quote: What a difference a day makes
courage.author: Haruki Murakami

courage.quote: He who limps is still walking
courage.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

courage.quote: Within you are so many answers
courage.author: Douglas Pagels

courage.quote: If it’s not okay, it’s not over
courage.author: Haruka Murakami

courage.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight
courage.author: Japanese proverb

courage.quote: Where you are, is not who you are
courage.author: Unknown

courage.quote: The best way out is always through
courage.author: Robert Frost

courage.quote: Encouragement is oxygen for the soul. John C
courage.author: Maxwell

courage.quote: The nature of this flower is to bloom
courage.author: Alice Walker

courage.quote: The beginnings of all things are small
courage.author: Cicero

courage.quote: You’re not too old and it’s not too late
courage.author: Lori Deschesne

courage.quote: Your largest fear carries your greatest growth
courage.author: Unknown

courage.quote: You can climb that mountain, you can reach the top
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: Stay humble, do your best, and the rest will follow
courage.author: Justin Kan

courage.quote: Your doubts create mountains, but your actions move them
courage.author: Mel Robbins

courage.quote: Don’t wait for a time when you’re free of fear. Feel the fear and do it anyway
courage.author: Gabby Bernstein

courage.quote: Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now, without delay
courage.author: Simone de Beauvoir

courage.quote: For everyone who’s been afraid to step up… this is for you. Decide to do it and the Universe will support you
courage.author: Gabby Bernstein

courage.quote: Cultivate a fearless approach to life, attack everything with boldness and energy
courage.author: Robert Greene

courage.quote: Reaching your dream will be tough. The road will be long and dark. But in the end, it will be worth it
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: Remember how far you’ve come, not just how far you have to go. You are not where you want to be, but neither are you where you used to be
courage.author: Rick Warren

courage.quote: If you want something, start working for it now. Don’t wait for anything. The clock is ticking
courage.author: Joe De Sana

courage.quote: You’re tired. You’re stressed. You’re mentally and physically drained. You feel alone. Struggling with the present, uncertain of the future. Life sucks right now. You’ll be fine. I promise…It gets better. Just keep moving forward
courage.author: Ralph Napolitano

courage.quote: You can be ten times what you are today at anything. And the only thing that holds you back is disciplined effort and a refusal to quit
courage.author: Tom Bilyeu

courage.quote: Be comforted, dear soul! There is always light behind the clouds
courage.author: Louisa May Alcott (Little Women)

courage.quote: Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow
courage.author: Doug Firebaugh

courage.quote: Courage is not a state. It’s an action that you need to practice everyday. When you practice everyday, you feel proud, powerful, build authentic pride in yourself, and create real confidence
courage.author: Mel Robbins

courage.quote: There is something in the human spirit that will survive and prevail, there is a tiny and brilliant light burning in the heart of man that will not go out no matter how dark the world becomes
courage.author: Leo Tolstoy

courage.quote: A word of encouragement from a teacher to a child can change a life. A word of encouragement from a spouse can save a marriage. A word of encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential. John C
courage.author: Maxwell

courage.quote: Treat a man as he is and he will remain as he is. Treat a man as he can and should be and he will become as he can and should be. Stephen R
courage.author: Covey (The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, Amazon book)

courage.quote: When you have something you want to do in your life: Just fuc*ing do it. Don’t second guess yourself, don’t overthink it. Go with your instincts and have a bias to action
courage.author: Justin Kan

courage.quote: Some people spend their whole lives waiting for the sound of a starting gun that never goes off. Don’t wait. Pull the trigger yourself
courage.author: The Stoic Emperor

courage.quote: Replace every "what if" with "why the hell not?"
courage.author: Mel Robbins

courage.quote: So far you’ve survived 100% of your worst days. You’re doing great
courage.author: Unknown

courage.quote: There is hardship in everything except eating pancakes
courage.author: Charles Spurgeon

courage.quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you
courage.author: Anne Lamott

courage.quote: Courage in the path is what makes the path manifest itself
courage.author: Paulo Coelho

courage.quote: You either walk inside your own story and own it, or you stand outside your story and hustle for your worthiness
courage.author: Brené Brown

courage.quote: What if everything you are going through is preparing you for what you asked for?
courage.author: Justin Perry

courage.quote: We are like the little branch that quivers during a storm, doubting our strength and forgetting we are the tree – deeply rooted to withstand all of life’s upheavals
courage.author: Dodinsky

courage.quote: The more you hope, the more you suffer. The more you suffer and keep going, the closer you get to your goal
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: The darkest night that ever fell upon the earth never hid the light, never put out the stars. It only made the stars more keenly, kindly glancing, as if in protest against the darkness
courage.author: George Eliot

courage.quote: We deserve some respect. You deserve some respect. You are important to other people, as much as to yourself. You have some vital role to play in the unfolding destiny of the world
courage.author: Jordan Peterson

courage.quote: Everything in life is a mind game! Whenever we get swept under by life’s dramas, large and small, we are forgetting that no matter how bad the pain gets, no matter how harrowing the torture, all bad things end
courage.author: David Goggins (Can’t Hurt Me, Amazon book)

courage.quote: Stop making excuses. Stop being a victim. Take personal responsibility. Hold yourself accountable. Get comfortable with the uncomfortable. And finally, make your dreams come true
courage.author: David Goggins
Don’t you know that day dawns after night, showers displace drought, and spring and summer follow winter? Then, have hope! Hope forever, for God will not fail you! Charles Spurgeon

courage.quote: God uses suffering as a whetstone, to make men sharp with
courage.author: Henry Ward Beecher

courage.quote: Curious that we spend more time congratulating people who have succeeded than encouraging people who have not
courage.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

courage.quote: We have to continually be jumping off cliffs and developing our wings on the way down
courage.author: Kurt Vonnegut

courage.quote: Effort, not genetics, is within your control
courage.author: Shane Parrish

courage.quote: Next to trying and winning, the best thing is trying and failing
courage.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

courage.quote: What is defeat? Nothing but education; nothing but the first steps to something better
courage.author: Wendell Phillips

courage.quote: Nobody starts with all the answers. The path to the summit is not fully visible from base camp
courage.author: James Clear

courage.quote: A fool’s answer is to work harder. A wise man stops, reflects, and simply takes the right direction
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: Have patience. Wait until the mud settles and the water is clear. Remain unmoving until right action arises by itself
courage.author: Lao Tzu

courage.quote: Do not struggle. Go with the flow of things, and you will find yourself at one with the mysterious unity of the Universe
courage.author: Zhuangzi

courage.quote: On the path to successful action, we will fail – possibly many times. And that’s okay. It can be a good thing, even. Action and failure are two sides of the same coin. One doesn’t come without the other
courage.author: Ryan Holiday

courage.quote: Dispelling dread isn’t a matter of trying to forget about washing dishes. It is realizing that in actual fact you only have one dish to wash, ever: this one; only one step to take, ever: this one. And that is Zen
courage.author: Alan Watts

courage.quote: When life is good, do not take it for granted. It will pass. When life falls apart, this too will pass. Life will have its unexpected turns
courage.author: Ajahn Brahm

courage.quote: Learn from your past experiences, but don’t get stuck in them. Your past should be a teacher, not a jailer. Don’t squander the present dueling with the shadows of the past. This moment is alive with possibility
courage.author: The Stoic Emperor

courage.quote: Accepting the inevitable is the beginning of strength and freedom. Embrace all chaos that is out of your control. This is how it is. Why should it be otherwise? Move the levers that are within your grasp. Sharpen the blade of will. Strike with precision. Accept and endure
courage.author: The Stoic Emperor

courage.quote: Nothing is ever as it seems. What looks bad today, can be a blessing tomorrow
courage.author: Iyanla Vanzant

courage.quote: Where you stumble and fall, there you will find gold
courage.author: Joseph Campbell

You say, hmm, I can get up! I have enough of life in me to make somebody jealous enough to want to knock me down. I have so much courage in me that I have the effrontery, the incredible gall to stand up. That’s it. That’s how you get to know who you are

courage.quote: Do not live to satisfy the expectations of others

courage.quote: Be proud to wear you

courage.author: Frederick Douglass

courage.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change
courage.author: Jim Rohn

courage.quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish
courage.author: Tony Robbins

courage.quote: We made the world we’re living in and we have to make it over
courage.author: James Baldwin

courage.quote: If you want peace, be above your desires. If you want meaning, fight for something important to you
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: What you must do now is to adapt fast. The world belongs to those who can change fast
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: If you never did you should. These things are fun, and fun is good. Dr
courage.author: Seuss

courage.quote: You’re off to great places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, So get on your way! Dr
courage.author: Seuss

courage.quote: You’ll be on your way up! You’ll be seeing great sights! You’ll join the high fliers who soar to high heights. Dr
courage.author: Seuss

courage.quote: Every day of our lives, we are on the verge of making those slight changes that would make all the difference
courage.author: Mignon McLaughlin

courage.quote: The more you adapt, the more interesting you are

courage.author: Du Bois

courage.quote: Step out of the history that is holding you back. Step into the new story you are willing to create

courage.quote: I’d rather regret the things I’ve done than regret the things I haven’t done

courage.quote: The world is round and the place which may seem like the end may also be the beginning

courage.author: Kezer

courage.quote: Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end

courage.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly
courage.author: Richard Bach

courage.quote: The bamboo that bends is stronger than the oak that resists

courage.quote: A scholar who loves comfort is not fit to be called a scholar
courage.author: Confucius

courage.quote: You cannot change what you are, only what you do

courage.quote: Everybody wants to change others. Nobody wants to be changed

courage.quote: If you have always done it that way, it is probably wrong

courage.quote: Progress is deciding what to stop doing

courage.quote: You have to know who you are to grow your potential. But you have to grow in order to know who you are. John C
courage.author: Maxwell

courage.quote: We did not change as we grew older; we just became more clearly ourselves

courage.quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself

courage.quote: All men make mistakes, but a good man yields when he knows his course is wrong, and repairs the evil. The only crime is pride

courage.quote: Every possession and every happiness is but lent by chance for an uncertain time, and may therefore be demanded back the next hour

courage.quote: Do I contradict myself? Very well, then, I contradict myself; I am large – I contain multitudes
courage.author: Walt Whitman

courage.quote: If you don’t like change, you’re going to like irrelevance even less
courage.author: General Eric Shinseki

courage.quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change
courage.author: Charles Darwin

courage.quote: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change
courage.author: Thomas Hardy

courage.quote: Nothing is absolute. Everything changes, everything moves, everything revolves, everything flies and goes away
courage.author: Frida Kahlo

courage.quote: Everything will be alright does not mean everything will stay the same
courage.author: Unknown

courage.quote: The 3 C’s in life: Choice, Chance, Change. You must make the Choice, to take the Chance, if you want anything in life to Change
courage.author: Unknown

courage.quote: Do not waste time on things you cannot change or influence
courage.author: Robert Greene

courage.quote: Every ultimate fact is only the first of a new series… The new statement is always hated by the old, and, to those dwelling in the old, comes like an abyss of skepticism

courage.quote: You must learn a new way to think before you can master a new way to be
courage.author: Marianne Williamson

courage.quote: Those who expect moments of change to be comfortable and free of conflict have not learned their history
courage.author: Joan Wallach Scott

courage.quote: The man who never alters his opinion is like standing water, and breeds reptiles of the mind

courage.quote: Stubbornness does have its helpful features. You always know what you are going to be thinking tomorrow
courage.author: Glen Beaman

courage.quote: Consider how hard it is to change yourself and you’ll understand what little chance you have in trying to change others. Jacob M

courage.quote: What you have become is the price you paid to get what you used to want

courage.quote: The wheel of change moves on, and those who were down go up and those who were up go down

courage.quote: All change is not growth, as all movement is not forward

courage.quote: You always have the choice between comfort and discomfort, mediocrity and growth, fitting in and standing out

courage.quote: Why fit in when you were born to stand out? Dr
courage.author: Seuss

courage.quote: The only way that we can live, is if we grow. The only way that we can grow is if we change. The only way that we can change is if we learn. The only way we can learn is if we are exposed. And the only way that we can become exposed is if we throw ourselves out into the open. Do it. Throw yourself.
courage.author: C. JoyBell C

courage.quote: I have not ceased being fearful, but I have ceased to let fear control me

courage.quote: Where your fear is, there is your task

courage.quote: I have lived my life according to this principle: If I’m afraid of it, then I must do it
courage.author: Erica Jong

courage.quote: I believe in getting into hot water; it keeps you clean. G.K
courage.author: Chesterton

courage.quote: A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is brave five minutes longer
courage.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

courage.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak. Courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen

courage.quote: The more you are motivated by love, the more fearless and free your action will be
courage.author: Dalai Lama

courage.quote: Stand for something or you will fall for anything. Today’s mighty oak is yesterday’s nut that held its ground

courage.quote: The important thing is this: To be able at any moment to sacrifice what we are for what we could become
courage.author: Charles DuBois

courage.quote: Courage starts with showing up and letting ourselves be seen
courage.author: Brené Brown

courage.quote: Do you have the courage to act outwardly on what you see inwardly. T.D
courage.author: Jakes

courage.quote: Courage means doing what’s right no matter what they say
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: Courage is a love affair with the unknown
courage.author: Osho

courage.quote: First principle: never to let one’s self be beaten down by persons or by events
courage.author: Marie Curie

courage.quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
courage.author: Vincent van Gogh

courage.quote: Courage is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm

courage.quote: Always do the things you fear the most. Courage is an acquired taste, like caviar

courage.quote: Amateurs are scared – scared to be vulnerable and honest with themselves. Professionals feel like they are capable of handling almost anything. Shane Parrish (fs
courage.author: blog)

courage.quote: Lean into (not away from) what’s making you uncomfortable

courage.quote: Will you dare to try and learn and grow? Or will you allow fear to take over? Life happens in the river, not on the shore

courage.quote: Don’t be ashamed to need help. Like a soldier storming a wall, you have a mission to accomplish
courage.author: And if you’ve been wounded and you need a comrade to pull you up? So what? Marcus Aurelius

courage.quote: I want to be in the arena. I want to be brave with my life. And when we make the choice to dare greatly, we sign up to get our asses kicked. We can choose courage or we can choose comfort, but we can’t have both. Not at the same time

courage.quote: It’s better to cross the line and suffer the consequences than to just stare at the line for the rest of your life

courage.quote: Running away from the immediacy of our experience is like preferring death to life

courage.quote: Accept in an unruffled spirit that which is inevitable
courage.author: Seneca

courage.quote: Let us not pray to be sheltered from dangers but to be fearless when facing them
courage.author: Rabindranath Tagore

courage.quote: The best way to neutralize our natural impatience is to cultivate a kind of pleasure in pain – like an athlete, you come to enjoy rigorous practice, pushing past your limits, and resisting the easy way out

courage.quote: The only alternative to a shuddering paralysis is to leap into action regardless of the consequences

courage.quote: Real courage is when you know you’re licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what

courage.quote: Having lived the life I’ve lived, and having seen the other side, not being afraid to attack what was in front of me, has made me happy

courage.quote: Have the courage to be who you are, not what people expect you to be

courage.quote: I beg you take courage; the brave soul can mend even disaster

courage.quote: Think of yourself as an explorer. You cannot find anything new if you are unwilling to leave the shore

courage.quote: Understand: we are all too afraid – of offending people, of stirring up conflict, of standing out from the crowd, of taking bold action

courage.quote: You can choose to let this thing bother you or let this be an adventure and welcome the challenge

courage.quote: One isn’t necessarily born with courage, but one is born with potential. Without courage, we cannot practice any other virtue with consistency. We can’t be kind, true, merciful, generous, or honest

courage.quote: The opposite for courage is not cowardice, it is conformity. Even a dead fish can go with the flow

courage.quote: To stand up straight with your shoulders back is to accept the terrible responsibility of life, with eyes wide open
courage.author: Jordan Peterson

courage.quote: Don’t avoid something frightening if it stands in your way
courage.author: Jordan Peterson

courage.quote: Our fear of messing up should give way to the only real danger there is, that of never trying
courage.author: Alain de Botton

courage.quote: Courage is the power to let go of the familiar
courage.author: Raymond Lindquist

courage.quote: Courage is seeing too much comfort will make you weak

courage.quote: Courage is a heart word. The root of the word courage is cor – the Latin word for heart. In one of its earliest forms, the word courage meant "To speak one’s mind by telling all one’s heart"

courage.quote: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount
courage.author: Clare Boothe Luce

courage.quote: Courage is risking the known for the unknown, the familiar for the unfamiliar
courage.author: Osho

courage.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear – not absence of fear

courage.quote: Death is nothing, but to live defeated is to die every day
courage.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

courage.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage

courage.quote: Be humble. Be hungry. And always be the hardest worker in the room
courage.author: Dwayne Johnson (The Rock)

courage.quote: A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is the prerogative of the brave
courage.author: Mahatma Gandhi

courage.quote: Too many men are afraid of being fools
courage.author: Henry Ford

courage.quote: We ought to face our destiny with courage
courage.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

courage.quote: No one can construct for you the bridge upon which precisely you must cross the stream of life, no one but you yourself alone
courage.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

courage.quote: The strangest, most generous, and proudest of all virtues is true courage
courage.author: Michel de Montaigne

courage.quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself
courage.author: Charlie Chaplin

courage.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the assessment that something else is more important than fear. Franklin D

courage.quote: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice. Have the courage to follow your own heart and intuition
courage.author: Steve Jobs

courage.quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life

courage.quote: Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most

courage.quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy
courage.author: Martin Luther King Jr

courage.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it
courage.author: Nelson Mandela

courage.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You must do the thing which you think you cannot do
courage.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

courage.quote: Courage is the commitment to begin without any guarantee of success
courage.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

courage.quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction. John F
courage.author: Kennedy

courage.quote: It is not the strength of the body that counts, but the strength of the spirit. J.R.R
courage.author: Tolkien

courage.quote: Courage is being scared to death, but saddling up anyway
courage.author: John Wayne

courage.quote: Freedom lies in bold action
courage.author: Robert Frost

courage.quote: Courage, dear heart. C.S
courage.author: Lewis (The Voyage of the Dawn Treader)

courage.quote: Choose courage over comfort
courage.author: Brené Brown (Dare to Lead)

courage.quote: A king is one who fears nothing
courage.author: Seneca

courage.quote: The scared freeze. The brave try
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: All serious daring starts from within
courage.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

courage.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you
courage.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

courage.quote: Courage is the only virtue you can’t fake
courage.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

courage.quote: Fear is a reaction. Courage is a decision
courage.author: Winston Churchill

courage.quote: What is to give light must endure burning. Viktor E
courage.author: Frankl

courage.quote: No man is defeated unless he is discouraged
courage.author: Bruce Lee

courage.quote: Nobody learns what he can do except by trying
courage.author: Seneca

courage.quote: I won’t be intimidated, and I won’t be silenced
courage.author: Meena Harris

courage.quote: Getting over yourself offers exponential returns
courage.author: Shane Parrish

courage.quote: Yesterday I dared to struggle. Today I dare to win
courage.author: Bernadette Devlin

courage.quote: Either life entails courage, or it ceases to be life. E. M
courage.author: Forster

courage.quote: Creativity requires the courage to let go of certainties
courage.author: Erich Fromm

courage.quote: Vulnerability is our most accurate measurement of courage
courage.author: Brené Brown

courage.quote: It’s possible to transcend anything that doesn’t kill you
courage.author: David Goggins (Can’t Hurt Me)

courage.quote: Don’t let not knowing how it will end keep you from starting
courage.author: Bob Goff

courage.quote: Choose the great adventure of being brave and afraid. At the exact same time
courage.author: Brené Brown (Dare to Lead)

courage.quote: No one knows what he can do till he tries
courage.author: Publius Syrus

courage.quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed
courage.author: Dale Carnegie

courage.quote: My courage always rises at every attempt to intimidate me
courage.author: Jane Austen (Pride and Prejudice)

courage.quote: Without dreams, there can be no courage. And without courage, there can be no action
courage.author: Wim Wenders

courage.quote: Self-knowledge leads to purpose. Purpose leads to motivation. Motivation leads to action. Taking action is brave
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: While you don’t control the outcome, you do control the effort
courage.author: Shane Parrish

courage.quote: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations
courage.author: Charles Swindoll

courage.quote: Be bold. Be courageous. Never be afraid to speak up and speak out
courage.author: John Lewis

courage.quote: Change is often a silent inside job that requires patience and courage. Courage to be your self. Courage to resist negativity. Courage to go beyond your boundaries. Courage to take responsibility for your own life
courage.author: Gordana Biernat

courage.quote: A savage mindset is a conditioned mindset that knows quitting is not part of the plan. It knows that it has to find a way around any and all obstacles to complete the mission
courage.author: Stay hard! David Goggins

courage.quote: If you want to be one of the few to defy those trends in our ever-softening society, you will have to be willing to go to war with yourself and create a whole new identity, which requires an open mind
courage.author: David Goggins (Can’t Hurt Me)

courage.quote: Don’t limit expectations of yourself and settle for anything less than what you are truly capable of achieving
courage.author: David Goggins

courage.quote: To improve at something, consistently put yourself in an uncomfortable place. Start a startup, train for a marathon, or commit to writing every day. Get comfortable with being uncomfortable
courage.author: Sahil Lavingia

courage.quote: Continue to be bold, courageous. Try to chose the wisest thing and once you’ve chosen the wisest thing go out and try to achieve it. Be it
courage.author: Maya Angelou

courage.quote: Start living in discomfort. Gradually increase it little by little, and you will steadily grow. If you want sudden growth, deluge yourself in great discomfort and do not retreat from it. The more discomfort you are willing to bear, the more you can grow
courage.author: The Ancient Sage

courage.quote: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. But there is no real security in what is no longer meaningful. There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power
courage.author: Alan Cohen

courage.quote: The sun will stand as your best man and whistle, when you have found the courage to marry forgiveness, when you have found the courage to marry love
courage.author: Hafez

courage.quote: "Brave" is the only thing that I ask myself to be. Brave to write, to love, to face criticism, to live according my own rules
courage.author: Paulo Coelho

courage.quote: There is nothing more useful in combating the tragedy of life than to struggle with all your soul on behalf of the good
courage.author: Jordan Peterson

courage.quote: People have this capacity within them to set the world straight
courage.author: Jordan Peterson

courage.quote: If you’re not in the arena also getting your ass kicked, I’m not interested in your feedback
courage.author: Brené Brown

courage.quote: The world is full of fools and faint hearts; and yet everyone has courage enough to bear the misfortunes, and wisdom enough to manage the affairs, of his neighbor
courage.author: Benjamin Franklin

courage.quote: Courage is not something that you already have that makes you brave when the tough times start. Courage is what you earn when you’ve been through the tough times and you discover they aren’t so tough after all
courage.author: Malcolm Gladwell (David and Goliath)

courage.quote: Remember, you can’t steal second if you don’t take your foot off first
courage.author: Mike Todd

courage.quote: Everyone has talent. What’s rare is the courage to follow it to the dark places where it leads
courage.author: Erica Jong

courage.quote: Trying to run away is never the answer to being fully human
courage.author: Pema Chödrön

courage.quote: Only those who can accept their own annihilation can have the courage to be true individuals
courage.author: Alan Watts

courage.quote: The stronger your principles and values, the more you’re willing to die for them
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die. G.K
courage.author: Chesterton

courage.quote: Free people can speak freely. If you fear to speak, you aren’t free
courage.author: The Stoic Emperor

courage.quote: Your fear of looking stupid is holding you back
courage.author: Justin Perry

courage.quote: One who asks fearfully teaches us to say no
courage.author: Seneca

courage.quote: Love is the most difficult and dangerous form of courage
courage.author: Delmore Schwartz

courage.quote: The traits I respect are erudition and the courage to stand up when half-men are afraid for their reputation. Any idiot can be intelligent
courage.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes)

courage.quote: The frontier is the edge between what you know and what you don’t know. You want to put yourself on that edge
courage.author: Jordan Peterson

courage.quote: People are weak because when challenged, they opt for the path of least resistance. Taking the path of least resistance makes them weaker still and thus more likely to opt for the path of least resistance again in the future. It’s a deadly cycle
courage.author: Zuby

courage.quote: Most of us have two lives: the life we live, and the unlived life within us. Between the two stands Resistance
courage.author: Steven Pressfield

courage.quote: The pain of trying and failing is intense and over rather quickly. The pain of failing to try, on the other hand, is less intense but never really goes away
courage.author: Shane Parrish

courage.quote: To dare is to lose one’s footing momentarily. To not dare is to lose oneself
courage.author: Søren Kierkegaard

courage.quote: Bliss is the outcome of fearlessness. Fear is death, fearless is eternal life
courage.author: Osho

courage.quote: There is only the trying. The rest is not our business. T. S
courage.author: Eliot

courage.quote: Necessity makes even the timid brave
courage.author: Sallust

courage.quote: The central question of a warrior’s training is not how we avoid uncertainty and fear but how we relate to discomfort
courage.author: Pema Chödrön

courage.quote: The average man lets fear take over. The wise man feels the fear and do it anyway. The average man has regrets. The wise man none
courage.author: Maxime Lagacé

courage.quote: Have the fearless attitude of a hero and the loving heart of a child
courage.author: Soyen Shaku

courage.quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point, which means at the point of highest reality. C.S
courage.author: Lewis

courage.quote: Whatever we learn to do, we learn by actually doing it; men come to be builders, for instance, by building, and harp players by playing the harp. In the same way, by doing just acts we come to be just; by doing self-controlled acts, we come to be self-controlled; and by doing brave acts, we become brave
courage.author: Aristotle

courage.quote: If you want to get an idea of a friend’s temperament, ethics, and personal elegance, you need to look at him under the tests of severe circumstances, not under the regular rosy glow of daily life
courage.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

courage.quote: It certainly takes bravery to remain skeptical; it takes inordinate courage to introspect, to confront oneself, to accept one’s limitations – Scientists are seeing more and more evidence that we are specifically designed by mother nature to fool ourselves
courage.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

courage.quote: The paradox of learning is that to get better, you need to go outside your comfort zone, and thus feel worse. The people who grow continuously, thus feel consistently over their heads
courage.author: Scott Young

courage.quote: Integrity is choosing courage over comfort; it’s choosing what’s right over what’s fun, fast, or easy; and it’s practicing your values, not just professing them
courage.author: Brené Brown (Dare to Lead)

courage.quote: The only way to solve a problem is to go through it rather than around it
courage.author: Bill Bradley

courage.quote: Self-knowledge is no guarantee of happiness, but it is on the side of happiness and can supply the courage to fight for it
courage.author: Simone de Beauvoir

courage.quote: Brilliant thinking is rare, but courage is in even shorter supply than genius
courage.author: Peter Thiel

courage.quote: Courage doesn’t mean you’re not afraid anymore, it just means your actions isn’t controlled by your doubts
courage.author: Thibaut

courage.quote: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit
courage.author: Baltasar Gracián

courage.quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world
courage.author: Helen Keller

courage.quote: Whatever you do, you need courage. Whatever course you decide upon, there is always someone to tell you that you are wrong. There are always difficulties arising that tempt you to believe your critics are right. To map out a course of action and follow it to an end requires some of the same courage that a soldier needs. Peace has its victories, but it takes brave men and women to win them
courage.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

courage.quote: Action is a high road to self-confidence and self-esteem
courage.author: Bruce Lee

courage.quote: Put all excuses aside and remember this – you are capable
courage.author: Zig Ziglar

courage.quote: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself
courage.author: Coco Chanel

courage.quote: Self-command is the main elegance
courage.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionable

With each step you take, you will grow stronger and stronger, more and more skilled, more and more self-confident and more and more successful

courage.quote: All I want to do is change the world. W

courage.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter, and those who matter don’t mind. Bernard M. Baruch (Falsy attributed
courage.author: Check out Quote Investigator for more)

courage.quote: I have no responsibility to be like they expect me to be. It’s their mistake, not my failing. Richard P

courage.quote: Confidence is the absence of doubt, not the presence of pride

courage.quote: When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you
courage.author: African proverb

courage.quote: Overconfidence is a product of ignorance

courage.quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom
